summary.para: Enables Sync Center to provide the event to link to so knows which event to operate upon.

param.name: rguidEventID
param.para: A reference to the event ID that is being stored. This parameter is the same as what is returned from the method of the pEvent parameter.

param.name: pEvent
param.para: A pointer to the object for to use. This is the event object that owns the link.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The event ID is the ID that the handler is given when is called, or is the ID provided by the handler when the event is obtained from the custom event store.
If you call , your events will be stored only until the user logs off or until the handler is synchronized again.
The interface that is used to implement custom event stores is .
The provided in the pEvent parameter is not the same object that came from a custom event store.

summary.para: Provides a method that is called when event links are clicked in the sync results folder.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface, from which it inherits.
Sync Center calls , specifying SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_EventLinkClick for the object ID.
